title: Altamont Free Concert
summary: The Altamont Speedway Free Festival was a counterculture rock concert in the United States, held on Saturday, December 6, 1969, at the Altamont Speedway in northern California (Livermore).[2][3][4][5] Approximately 300,000 attended the concert,[2][4][5] and some anticipated that it would be a "Woodstock West".[6] The Woodstock festival was held in Bethel, New York, in mid-August, fewer than four months earlier.
